data.name: Revival of the Road
data.detailed_description:
Why is the game paid?

By purchasing the game - you support us very much!
Since we have neither funding nor sponsors, we have to make the game paid in order to at least slightly compensate for all the expenses that go to it!


Why did we release a project on Steam so early?

All for the sake of our audience , who was burning with the desire to try out the developments that we have at the moment.
Please do not judge strictly, and remember, that the simulator is being actively developed, and what you now see in front of you is only the beginning .

If you want to help us in the development of the project, be sure to subscribe to our official VKontakte public. You will be aware of all the news and recent events, and we will receive an additional incentive to develop and make the game better.
In the same place you can express your opinion, which is VERY IMPORTANT for us!
https://vk.com/rotroad


Testing updates

Be sure to see Beta Versions (Library> Properties> Beta Versions)
There we post versions for testing, which are then filled in as an official update!


About the Game

Welcome to the project of the world in which you can become anyone you want!

This is an entertaining simulator of a digital virtual universe inside your PC.

The world where the main restriction is your fantasy.


Inside the ROTR universe there are branches - SystemWorld worlds (Authorization Island) and CityWorld worlds with copies of real cities.

Development of CityWorld began with the city - of Astrakhan, the Caspian capital of Russia.
At the moment, the game features a small part of the map, expanding and increasing in size every day.
Despite the excessive employment associated with life circumstances and opportunities, the development of the game is underway, and the project is actively developing every day!
